text: The Egypt Basketball Cup is an annual knockout competition among Egyptian basketball teams. The Zamalek team has won the cup 12 times since 1975. == Winners by club == {| class="wikitable centre" |- ! Club !! Titles |- |1- Zamalek||align=center| 13 |- |2- Ittihad||align=center| 11 |- |3- Al Ahly||align=center| 10 |- |4- Sporting||align=center| 7 |- |5- Gezira||align=center| 4 |- |} == List of winners == {| class="wikitable" style="margin:1em 2em 1em 1em;" |- !Year !Champion |- |1974–1975 |Zamalek |- |- |1975–1976 |Ittihad |- |1976–1977 |Sporting |- |1977–1978 |Ittihad |- |1978–1979 |Zamalek |- |1979–1980 |Zamalek |- |1980–1981 |Zamalek |- |1981–1982 |Ittihad |- |1982–1983 |Ittihad |- |1983–1984 |Ittihad |- |1984–1985 |Ittihad |- |1985–1986 |Ittihad |- |1986–1987 |Ittihad |- |1987–1988 |Al Ahly |- |1988–1989 |Ittihad |- |1989–1990 |Gezira |- |1990–1991 |Zamalek |- |1991–1992 |Zamalek |- |1992–1993 |Al Ahly |- |1993–1994 |Gezira |- |1994–1995 |Al Ahly |- |1995–1996 |Al Ahly |- |1996–1997 |Zamalek |- |1997–1998 |Zamalek |- |1998–1999 |Al Ahly |- |1999–2000 |Zamalek |- |2000–2001 |Zamalek |- |2001–2002 |Zamalek |- |2002–2003 |Zamalek |- |2003–2004 |Al Ahly |- |2004–2005 |Gezira |- |2005–2006 |Zamalek |- |2006–2007 |Al Ahly |- |2007–2008 |Sporting |- |2008–2009 |Al Ahly |- |2009–2010 |Ittihad |- |2010–2011 |Al Ahly |- |2011–2012 |Ittihad |- |2012–2013 |Sporting |- |2013–2014 |Sporting |- |2014–2015 |Sporting |- |2015–2016 |Sporting |- |2016–2017 |Sporting |- |2017–2018 |Al Ahly |- |2018–2019 |Gezira |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Egyptian Basketball Cup 2018, goalzz.com.
